md:
giải nghĩa từ "profound" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Profound (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Very great or intense; showing a deep understanding or feeling.
	+ Example: "The profound impact of the war on the country's economy."
	+ Related words: deep, intense, significant, powerful, strong.

* Profound (noun)
	+ Meaning: A deep or intense feeling or quality.
	+ Example: "The profound sadness in her eyes was heartbreaking."
	+ Related words: depth, intensity, emotion, passion, fervor.

Note: The word "profound" can be used as both an adjective and a noun, depending on the context of the sentence.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "profound" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Profound (adjective)

    • Meaning: Very great or intense; showing a deep understanding or feeling.
    • Example: "The profound impact of the war on the country's economy."
    • Related words: deep, intense, significant, powerful, strong.

  • Profound (noun)

    • Meaning: A deep or intense feeling or quality.
    • Example: "The profound sadness in her eyes was heartbreaking."
    • Related words: depth, intensity, emotion, passion, fervor.

Note: The word "profound" can be used as both an adjective and a noun, depending on the context of the sentence.
